articles.title: Indian billionaire heir Anant Ambani weds at lavish, star-studded ceremony - CNN
articles.description: The son of India’s richest man married heiress Radhika Merchant before thousands of guests including Kim Kardashian, Nick Jonas, Priyanka Chopra and John Cena.
